## Where type

Where clause

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Where<MT extends object = AnyObject> = Condition<MT> | AndClause<MT> | OrClause<MT>;
```
**References:** [Condition](./filter.condition.md)<!-- -->, [AndClause](./filter.andclause.md)<!-- -->, [OrClause](./filter.orclause.md)

## Example


```ts
{
  name: {inq: ['John', 'Mary']},
  status: 'ACTIVE'
  and: [...],
  or: [...],
}
```
